projects: [{"title":"Reminisce | Geotag Image App","start_date":"Nov 2021","end_date":"Dec 2021","description":"Developed a location based photo collection mobile app using React Native, Expo andMetro Bundler.Used Media Library to store the captured or selected photos and Async Storage to store the data related to grouping by location.Implemented Stack Navigation and Async permission requests for Storage, Camera and Location ."},{"title":"Pictogram | Image Browsing WebApp","start_date":"May 2021","end_date":"Jun 2021","description":"Part of Frontend Team to create improvements and make integral components for website using React.jsCreated a dashboard by fetching data from the server to display stocks in real-time usingAxios and MaterialUIBuilt Filter Component to optimize the selection of stock with multiple filter criteria and saved user interests in the databaseWorked on the Navigation Bar, made the web design layout adaptive, and performed pear testing"},{"title":"Bisect | Bill Splitting WebApp","start_date":"Mar 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"Developed a MERN application for managing bills among acquaintances with a team of 3Used JWT for authentication and bcrypt library for encoding password protection against brute-force search attackImproved code reuse and performance by making effective use of various design patternsand CRUD operations"},{"title":"Electric Vehicle Fueling | Guided by-Prof Partha Pratim Chakrabarti, Course Project, Artificial Intelligence","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Feb 2021","description":"Developed a Heuristic and Optimal solution for Electric Cars traveling through a city network having different discharge rates.Implemented A* and DFS algorithm to minimize the travel time for the car taking maximum time"}]
